title: How to prepare GATE exam syllabus - Quora

response.answer_text: GATE Exam or Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering is gateway to reputed institutes like IITs, IIITs, IISC, foreign universities like NUS, NTU, TUG, etc for Mtech, MS , Phd programs, Research Projects, etc. But in order to clear the GATE Exam and get your dream career, you will have to follow a strict schedule and also be regular with your preparations. Key check pointers that you must follow for GATE Exam preparations: Know the GATE syllabus as per stream and be thorough with the important topics and chapters.Go through the previous years papers and few mock tests to know the exam pattern and to analyze where you stand. This will help you prepare a study plan as per your target score.Ensure that you have a good mentor to guide you well and help you overcome your weak areas. A mentor can your professor, a senior or a friend who has already cleared GATE exam in past.Join coaching if necessary. You may opt for online coaching as well to save time and if you are working professional.Prepare a study plan - week wise or month wise. Stick to it. Modify whenever necessary.Complete the entire syllabus at least once. Prepare notes for revision purpose.Solve numerical problems regularly. You can refer previous year papers for the question pattern.DO NOT leave Engineering Mathematics & Aptitude. It can fetch you straight 30 marks.REVISE on a regular basis. This will strengthen your concept as well as build your confidence.Practice and Take Mock Tests Regularly. This is a MUST.Focus on your health and extra curricular activities as well.Follow these tips and you will easily ace GATE Exam. If you need the syllabus to start with preparation, follow the following article: GATE SYLLABUS - STREAM WISE All the Best!

know the subjects…their weightage in GATE…read standard books..do derivation..read diagrams…memorize everything…keep revising..do previous year GATE IES questions…best of luck..for more info you can follow my blog examnikalo.blogspot.com

GATE is an exam that primarily tests the comprehensive understanding of various undergraduate subject in English and science…the knowledge/skill tested here are bachelor's degree level knowledge of the chosen engineering discipline or masters degree level knowledge of chosen science discipline….. Work accordingly and you will find success following you……. All the best

Take any postal material or its better to use the class notes zerox of any good coaching and just follow that. Complete the subjects, clear all the concepts n then. Give test. Try to improve yourself in every test.
